bio: The lantern-like Bloominoko appears on Halloween night. His hat is stuffed with colorful sweets which grant children good fortune.

soultimate.name: Lucky Smile
soultimate.description: Allies recover a lot of HP.

skill.effect: 12% Spd and 30% MM Spd boost when below 25% HP.
skill.name: Fight or Flight

name: Lantern Bloominoko
